name: The Twine Thing
description:
yup, this thing may definitely have bugs, so be sure to point them out

V1.2: added weighing yourself, among other things ; squashed some bugs, removed herobrine

V1.3: (benevolently) put a mirror in the bedroom that you are NOW able to finally leave, and gave you both eyes and hair that can be colored, along with some minor linguistic changes, you're welcome
